payload.message: Run weekly security audit: 1) Execute `openclaw security audit --deep` and save to reports/security-YYYY-MM-DD.txt. 2) Analyze results for CRITICAL/WARN/INFO issues. 3) If CRITICAL found, immediately notify Aaron via Telegram with details. 4) Generate weekly security report including: audit results, security trends, recommendations, comparison to previous week. 5) Include JoJo's security learning notes (10+ checks) in review. 6) Save full report to reports/weekly-security-YYYY-MM-DD.md.
